dmca.title: Individual complains of blog copying
dmca.body:
[private]
Subject: Attn: Blogger Legal Support DMCA complaints 

NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT 
Complainant Name: [private]
Address: [private]
Country: Portugal
Phone [private]

Date: Aug 18th 2006 

This copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following 
URL's and/or the infringing activity is found at the following URL's: I request that the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access to it disabled.

http://qinsnovies.blogspot.com/2O06/08/viv-thomas-six-days-with-vera2.html
 
THIS NOTICE IS PER THE DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT of 1998 

As the owners of the exclusive right to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States, that the information in this notification a accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that as the complaining party and owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this notification. 

[signed]
[private]
[private]@vivthomas.com 
24/08/2006
